scripts.migration:add: export PATH="$HOME/.dotnet:$PATH" && dotnet ef migrations add
scripts.migration:remove: export PATH="$HOME/.dotnet:$PATH" && dotnet ef migrations remove
scripts.migration:list: export PATH="$HOME/.dotnet:$PATH" && dotnet ef migrations list
scripts.db:update: export PATH="$HOME/.dotnet:$PATH" && dotnet ef database update
scripts.db:drop: export PATH="$HOME/.dotnet:$PATH" && dotnet ef database drop
